articles.title: Video: What could be next for Alex Jones? One lawyer's take - CNN Video
articles.description: Dave Aronberg, State Attorney for Palm Beach County, Florida, weighs in on what's next for Alex Jones following the $45.2 million punitive damages verdict against him.

articles.title: Watch: Parkland shooter's attorney cries as victim's wife testifies - CNN Video
articles.description: The state rested its case against Marjory Stoneman Douglas High School shooter Nikolas Cruz. Jurors visited the Florida school building where the mass shooting occurred to decide if Cruz should get the death penalty. The crime scene was left untouched since 2…

articles.author: Faith Karimi, CNN
articles.title: They survived a mass shooting at their California high school 30 years ago. It still affects them today
articles.description: On May 1, 1992 -- seven years before Columbine -- a gunman killed four people and wounded 10 others at a California high school. CNN spoke to two survivors about their terrifying memories of that day -- and how it still affects them three decades later.
articles.content:
(CNN)Angela Welch still recalls every detail. The stocky gunman in a camo vest. The gunshots, one after another. The piercing screams, echoing through the building. The muffled sobs.

articles.author: Jennifer Agiesta and Dan Merica, CNN
articles.title: Republican congressman who voted to impeach Trump wins primary, CNN projects
articles.description: Republican Rep. Dan Newhouse and Democrat Doug White will advance to the general election out of the top-two primary in Washington's 4th Congressional District, CNN projects.

articles.author: Kevin Liptak, CNN
articles.title: Joe Biden's hugely consequential Covid isolation
articles.description: A fatigued, runny-nosed President Joe Biden entered Covid solitude on July 21 with his legislative agenda stalled, a standoff brewing with the House speaker and an unfinished plan to kill the world's top terrorist with a drone.

articles.author: Uliana Pavlova and Jonny Hallam, CNN
articles.title: Top Russian hypersonic missile scientist arrested on treason charge
articles.description: A leading Russian scientist in hypersonic flight was arrested on suspicion of treason on Friday, according to Russian state media.

articles.author: Chloe Melas and Cheri Mossburg, CNN
articles.title: Anne Heche in critical condition following fiery car crash
articles.description: A woman crashed her car into a house in the Mar Vista neighborhood of Los Angeles on Friday, setting both the vehicle, and the house on fire, officials say. A person with knowledge of the matter told CNN the driver was actress Anne Heche.

articles.title: Michigan prosecutors say accused Oxford High shooter's parents exposed him to chaotic home life
articles.description: Michigan prosecutors say the parents of accused Oxford High School shooter Ethan Crumbley exposed him to years of "chaotic, toxic conflict," and that they left him in an unstable home often with little supervision, creating a pathway to violence.
